translated: The Paṭṭhāna Treatise🔽The forward and reverse order of conditions, the triplets, the Paṭṭhāna text

original: Dhammānulomapaccanīya (3), Tikatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (5)🔽17.24. Saṅkiliṭṭhattika, Kusalattika🔽Asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
analyzed: dhamma anuloma paccanīya  saṅkiliṭṭhattika kusalattika  a saṅkiliṭṭha saṅkilesikam kusalam dhammam paṭicca na saṅkiliṭṭha saṅkilesikaḥ na kusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi
translated: The three kinds of defiled, the three kinds of profitable

original: Asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naasaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesiko nakusalo🔽dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha …pe… avigate cha.
analyzed: asaṅkiliṭṭha asaṅkilesikam kusalam dhammam paṭicca na asaṅkiliṭṭha asaṅkilesikaḥ na kusalaḥ  dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi saṅkhitta hetuyā cha adhipatiyā cha pe avigate cha
translated: With a defiled-undefiled-cum-defiled profitable dhamma as condition there arises a defiled-undefiled-cum-defiled unprofitable dhamma … With a defiled-undefiled-cum-defiled profitable dhamma as condition there arises a defiled-undefiled-cum-defiled indeterminate dhamma … With a defiled-undefiled-cum-defiled profitable dhamma as condition there arise a defiled-undefiled-cum-defiled profitable and a defiled-undefiled-cum-defiled indeterminate dhammas … With a defiled-undefiled-cum-defiled profitable dhamma as condition there arise a defiled-undefiled-cum-defiled profitable and a defiled-undefiled-cum-defiled unprofitable dhammas … With a defiled-undefiled-cum-defiled profitable dhamma as condition there arise a defiled-undefiled-cum-defiled profitable and a defiled-undefiled-cum-defiled unprofitable and a defiled-undefiled-cum-defiled indeterminate dhammas … With a defiled-undefiled-cum-defiled profitable dhamma as condition there arises a defiled-undefiled-cum-defiled profitable dhamma and a defiled-undefiled-cum-defiled unprofitable dhamma and a defiled-undefiled-cum-defiled indeterminate dhamma, in the way already given.

original: Saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: saṅkiliṭṭha saṅkilesikam akusalam dhammam paṭicca na saṅkiliṭṭha saṅkilesikaḥ na akusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi saṅkhitta hetuyā adhipatiyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi
translated: With a defiled-undefiled-cum-undefiled profitable dhamma as condition there arises a defiled-undefiled-cum-undefiled unprofitable dhamma … With a defiled-undefiled-cum-undefiled profitable dhamma as condition there arises a defiled-undefiled-cum-undefiled indeterminate dhamma … With a defiled-undefiled-cum-undefiled profitable dhamma as condition there arise a defiled-undefiled-cum-undefiled profitable and a defiled-undefiled-cum-undefiled indeterminate dhammas … With a defiled-undefiled-cum-undefiled profitable dhamma as condition there arise a defiled-undefiled-cum-undefiled profitable and a defiled-undefiled-cum-undefiled unprofitable dhammas … With a defiled-undefiled-cum-undefiled profitable dhamma as condition

original: Asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paccayā naasaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha …pe… avigate cha.
analyzed: asaṅkiliṭṭha saṅkilesikam abyākatam dhammam paccayā na asaṅkiliṭṭha saṅkilesikaḥ na abyākataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā cha pe avigate cha
translated: With a conditionally-arisen, unadulterated, indeterminate state as condition, there arises an unadulterated, indeterminate state that is conditionally-arisen. (In brief:) With respect to cause, there are six … With respect to non-hindrance, there are six.
